title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 61-3.6 - Crane operators examining board
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 61-3.6 - Crane operators examining board

State Regulations

The commissioner may appoint an examining board which
shall consist of at least three members, at least one of whom shall be a crane
operator who holds a valid certificate of competence issued by the
commissioner, and at least one of whom shall be a representative of crane
owners. The members of the examining board shall serve at the pleasure of the
commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
61-3.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
